trans-unit.source: Provides facilities for managing and interacting with the Text Services Framework, which provides support for alternate text input methods such as speech and handwriting.
trans-unit.target: 提供功能，以管理，並與其互動的文字服務架構，提供替代文字輸入方法，例如語音和手寫的支援。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether or not this input method can display configuration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個輸入的法是否可以顯示組態[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: **true** if configuration [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] can be displayed; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果組態[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]可以顯示，否則**false**。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this input method can display word registration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這是否輸入方法可以顯示 word 註冊[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: **true** if word registration [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] can be displayed; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果 word 註冊[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]可以顯示，否則**false**。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to any currently active input method associated with the current context.
trans-unit.target: 取得與目前內容關聯任何目前作用中的輸入方法的參考。

trans-unit.source: A reference to an <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod"></xref> object associated with the current context, or **null** if there is no active input method.
trans-unit.target: 參考<xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod"></xref>與目前內容中，相關聯的物件或**null**如果沒有任何作用中的輸入的法。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.InputScope*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.InputScope*>附加指定的相依性物件的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.InputScope*>

trans-unit.source: The dependency object for which to retrieve the input scope.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取輸入的範圍的相依性物件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputScope"></xref> object representing the current input scope for the specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputScope"> </xref>物件，代表指定相依性物件的目前輸入的範圍。

trans-unit.source: Raised when target is **null**.
trans-unit.target: Raised when target is **null**.

trans-unit.target: 要擷取的<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodEnabled*>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodEnabled*>值的相依性物件

trans-unit.target: 目前的值<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodEnabled*>所指定相依性物件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodEnabled*>

trans-unit.target: Raised when target is **null**.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current state of handwriting input for this input method.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個輸入法手寫輸入的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethodState"></xref> enumeration specifying the current input method state for handwriting input.
trans-unit.target: 成員<xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethodState"></xref>指定手寫輸入目前的輸入的法狀態列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethodState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethodState"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current conversion mode for the input method editor associated with this input method.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與這個輸入法相關聯的輸入的法編輯器目前的轉換模式。

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeConversionModeValues"></xref> enumeration specifying the conversion mode.
trans-unit.target: 成員<xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeConversionModeValues"></xref>列舉指定的轉換模式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeConversionModeValues"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeConversionModeValues"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current sentence mode for the input method editor associated with this input method.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與這個輸入法相關聯的輸入的法編輯器目前的句子模式。

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeSentenceModeValues"></xref> enumerations specifying the sentence mode.
trans-unit.target: 成員<xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeSentenceModeValues"></xref>指定句子模式的列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeSentenceModeValues"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeSentenceModeValues"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current state of the input method editor associated with this input method.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與這個輸入法相關聯的輸入的法編輯器的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethodState"></xref> enumeration specifying the state of the input method editor associated with this input method.
trans-unit.target: 成員<xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethodState"></xref>列舉，指定與這個輸入法相關聯的輸入的法編輯器狀態。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethodState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethodState"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raised when target is **null**.
trans-unit.target: Raised when target is **null**.

trans-unit.source: Displays configuration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] associated with the currently active keyboard text service.
trans-unit.target: 顯示組態[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]與目前作用中的鍵盤的文字服務相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Displays configuration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] associated with the currently active keyboard text service, using a specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> as the parent element for the configuration [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 顯示組態[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]目前作用中的鍵盤的文字服務，使用指定相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>組態的父項目為[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that will be used as the parent element for the configuration [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ，將會當做父項目設定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Displays word registration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] associated with the currently active keyboard text service.
trans-unit.target: 顯示斷註冊[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]與目前作用中的鍵盤的文字服務相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Displays word registration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] associated with the currently active keyboard text service.
trans-unit.target: 顯示斷註冊[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]與目前作用中的鍵盤的文字服務相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a specified string as the default value to register.
trans-unit.target: 接受指定的字串做為要登錄的預設值。

trans-unit.source: Typically the value specified by *registeredText* is used to pre-populate the word registration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 所指定的值通常*registeredText*用來預先填入單字登錄[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies a value to register.
trans-unit.target: 字串，指定要註冊的值。

trans-unit.source: Displays word registration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] associated with the currently active keyboard text service.
trans-unit.target: 顯示斷註冊[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]與目前作用中的鍵盤的文字服務相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a specified string as the default value to register, and a specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> as the parent element for the configuration [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 接受指定的字串做為預設值，若要註冊，並指定<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>組態的父項目為[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Typically the value specified by *registeredText* is used to pre-populate the word registration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 所指定的值通常*registeredText*用來預先填入單字登錄[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that will be used as the parent element for the word registration [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> ，將作為父項目單字登錄[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies a value to register.
trans-unit.target: 字串，指定要註冊的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the speech mode for this input method.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個輸入法的語音模式。

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.SpeechMode"></xref> enumeration specifying the current speech mode.
trans-unit.target: 成員<xref href="System.Windows.Input.SpeechMode"></xref>指定目前的語音模式列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.SpeechMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Input.SpeechMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input method state (represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.ImeState*> property) changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的輸入的方法狀態 (由<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.ImeState*>屬性) 變更。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.ImeState*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
